DocLocalization.Name: Relation entre un document et des documents associÃ©s

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingDocument
DocAttribute.Documentation: The document that acts as the parent, referencing or original document in a relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedDocuments
DocAttribute.Documentation: The document that acts as the child, referenced or replacing document in a relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: RelationshipType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Describes the type of relationship between documents. This could be sub-document, replacement etc. The interpretation has to be established in an application context.
